channel.title: News on Booster Timeline
channel.description: Recent content in News on Booster Timeline

item.title: You probably don't need another booster
item.description: Some parts of the immune system sustained, showing strong response to any new coronavirus variant.

item.title: Covid News: New York Backs Off Booster Mandate for Health Care Workers
item.description: Since around 25% of New Yorkers with a career in healthcare are unwilling to get the booster shot, NYC hospitals are dropping the requirement to get a booster in order to maintain a staff.

item.title: Waning Vaccine Effectiveness
item.description: … the effectiveness of double vaccinations and triple vaccinations fall of from 87% and 91% to 66% and 78% respectively

item.title: Discussion of fourth shot
item.description: more nations are discussing the possibility of fourth doses of coronavirus vaccine for their most vulnerable. In the United States, health officials emphasized late last year that fourth doses were not yet needed and said it was too premature to be discussing a potential fourth dose of coronavirus vaccine for most people.

item.title: CDC Overrules Advisory Panel
item.description: C.D.C. Chief Overrules Agency Panel and Recommends Pfizer-BioNTech Boosters for Workers at Risk

item.title: FDA Authorizes Booster Dose of Pfizer-BioNTech COVID-19 Vaccine for Certain Populations
item.description: FDA authorization for a booster dose of Pfizer’s Covid-19 vaccine for people in 65 and older, people at high risk of severe disease, and people whose jobs put them at risk of infection.

item.title: F.D.A. Advisory Panel
item.description: insufficient evidence to recommend third shots for all adult recipients of the vaccine, as Pfizer had requested

item.title: New Study of Covid Booster Shots Fans Debate Over Benefits
item.description: As a short period study on the effectiveness of a third booster is released from Israel, Government and health officials debate on whether to push for a booster and for whom, all before the F.D.A has even approved a third dose

item.title: Do We Need Booster Shots More than the World Needs Vaccines
item.description: … Director of the World Health Organization said booster programs “make a mockery of vaccine equity.”

item.title: Pfizer to seek FDA authorization for third, booster dose of its Covid-19 vaccine
item.description: Phizer wants to get a booster shot authorization from the FDA because Phizer’s research suggests that antibodies from initial doses are weening
